digitalTransformation.heading: Digital transformation
digitalTransformation.description: It is an essential bridge between the business of today and the business of tomorrow.
digitalTransformation.description2: We will help you thrive in the transformative age by experimenting with new ideas to seize opportunities and scale successes.
digitalTransformation.DevelopmentDesc: Following the Agile Scrum Methodology, our process is flexible, fully transparent, and results-oriented. Based on product needs, we assemble a team who will take the set of prioritized features and start coding, as it can be sized up or down according to product needs at any point in time.
digitalTransformation.DesignPrototypeDesc: Design thinking will lead to rapid prototyping of your product - we produce sketches, mockups, and wireframes delivered by UI/UX designers who will be specialized in your field.
digitalTransformation.IdeateValidateDesc: Scoping sessions run by subject matter experts, analysts, and product managers to ensure you are building the right product for the right audience from day one.
digitalTransformation.ScaleSupportDesc: We won’t abandon you after the launch. Our team will continuously deliver support in the form of software maintenance, improvements, scaling, and upgrades to your product.
digitalTransformation.DeployAnalyzeDesc: We will let the users experience your product, along with making an effort throughout the product deployment and after!
digitalTransformation.TestAssessDesc: Testing the software is a critical part of the development cycle, we believe there is always room for improvement and making sure the product is working well, to maximize performance, enhance scalability and maintain top-notch quality of products.
digitalTransformation.modernDescription1: We use solid expertise to make the promise of digital transformation a reality and help in transforming your business and operating models to become agile and innovative.
digitalTransformation.modernDescription2: We will dive into your business ecosystem and create a web or mobile application on different platforms using top-notch technologies and proven methodologies, tools, and approaches.
digitalTransformation.info1: Keep your business on top of the ever-changing global market. We help companies identify growth possibilities for innovation and match their needs to the right technological solution.
digitalTransformation.info2: We believe that digital transformation creates sweeping changes and a strategic approach to it is crucial!
digitalTransformation.title2: Are you prepared for digital transformation
digitalTransformation.info3: Every organization needs a digital-first strategy to survive. Now, the only question is how
digitalTransformation.ourProcessDesc: Accelerate your digital transformation journey through a continuous process involving new technologies and ways of working to compete through continued innovation.
digitalTransformation.caseStudyHead: See how Inovola's digital transformation services help clients transform their business and operating models in the digital era with a few success stories from our growing portfolio.

hrService.heading: HR as a Service
hrService.description: We seek to increase employee retention by making sure they are fairly treated and that their professional development is valued, to drive a business to success.
hrService.headingpart1: Ramp up your team on-demand, We make
hrService.descriptionData: We bring you a high quality of managing your team to help them grow and your business, thrive through:
hrService.listData1: Provide training,performance management, guidance, and HR management tools and servicesby HR consultants.
hrService.listData2: Handle hiring, onboarding, payroll administration, payroll tax support, and benefits administration.
hrService.listData3: Tracking and monitoring timesheets and setting up administrative support.
hrService.PlanningDesc: Determine what the organization wants and analyze the objectives and plans.
hrService.ValidatingDesc: Evaluate the current state of the organization’s workforce and uncover gaps to create the road map to success.
hrService.DevelopingAndImplementingDesc: Formulate a human resource action plan that aligns with your organization’s overall strategy to take it to the ideal stage. Then determine whether the HR plan is yielding results and and achieving goals.
hrService.MonitorAndReviewDesc: Determine whether the HR plan is yielding results and executing the organizational strategy, and achieving goals.
hrService.ourProcessDesc: It is all about getting your core HR work done through fundamental strategies necessary for maintaining smooth employee lifecycles and positive employee experiences.
hrService.caseStudyHead: See how Inovola's effective Human Resources practices can support and enable business growth with a few success stories from our growing portfolio.
hrService.info1: You can rely on us to handle the employee's entire life cycle, from hiring to offboarding, as we believe that the right human resource management helps improve the effectiveness of an organization.
hrService.info2: We enable companies to reduce their HR workload by finding the optimum HR solution that suits their requirements. You can use one of our functions, or you can combine several. It’s entirely up to you.

devTeam.heading: DevTeam as a Service
devTeam.description: We believe that we will make a difference through a combination of smart planning, design thinking approach, and using the latest technologies.
devTeam.modernDescription1: We use solid expertise to make the promise of digital transformation a reality and help in transforming your business and operating models to become agile and innovative through custom software development, digital experience design, and cloud-managed services.
devTeam.rampUp: Ramp up your team on-demand, We make
devTeam.modernDescription: With the dedicated team model, we hire the right software developers and engineers efficiently to work on your project.
devTeam.modernDescription2: Every developer is matched perfectly to your needs and pre-vetted for their experience, skills, and requirements.
devTeam.modernDescription3: We have a great experience including but not limited to:
devTeam.title1: Make better products make products better

devTeam.title2: What we can do for your business

devTeam.BackendDevelopmentDesc: Our back-end development team delivers performant and secure solutions tailored to the needs of each client to achieve the business goals whether for various web, cloud-based or mobile apps across multiple domains
devTeam.FrontendDevelopmentDesc: Our front-end development team delivers supreme visual experiences across devices by creating interactive applications that have the UI and business logic seamlessly baked together, as they will be able to build responsive, innovative, and user-centric solutions.
devTeam.MobileDevelopmentDesc: Our mobile development will be able to offer a full cycle of application design, integration, and impactful management services, to bring your project to market on every device and platform. Whether it is an enterprise-class solution or a consumer-oriented app.
devTeam.ECommerceDesc: Our development team will provide custom e-commerce development services across various industries, as they have massive experience in building reliable solutions - B2C/B2B e-commerce portals based on both commercial and open-source platforms.
devTeam.FindMatchedTalentsDesc: Interview your selected candidates. You are ensured not only of velocity but of top quality.
devTeam.KickstartSquadDesc: After signing the contract, the selected candidates will be on-boarded to start the journey.
devTeam.successDescription: See how Inovola's DevTeam service helps clients create a boundless impact and execute more effectively by partnering with the best talent, with a few success stories from our growing portfolio.
devTeam.IdeateValidateDesc: Identify your target by sharing with us your technical needs, position requirements, and strategic route.
